```css
// Property: defaults
// Description: Specifies which values should be taken from the defaults.
// Component(s): Ti.Android.Notification
'.defaults-all[platform=android]': { defaults: Ti.Android.DEFAULT_ALL }
'.defaults-lights[platform=android]': { defaults: Ti.Android.DEFAULT_LIGHTS }
'.defaults-sound[platform=android]': { defaults: Ti.Android.DEFAULT_SOUND }
'.defaults-vibrate[platform=android]': { defaults: Ti.Android.DEFAULT_VIBRATE }
```
